title: (4013) New 2 Stored House for Sale. Pelawatha Battaramulla,
details: New 2 Stored House for Sale. Pelawatha Battaramulla, (10.5 Perches) - Ground floor Consists of Sitting area, Dining area, Pantry, Kitchen, 4 Bed Room, Bath Room, Servant Toilet with Store Room and Garage. First floor Consists of Master Bedroom with Attached Bathroom, TV lounge, 02 Bed Rooms, Common Bathrooms, and a front side Balcony. Beautiful view area The House is fully Tiled, fitted Ceiling Fans, Roller Shutter Geat, has Pipe Borne Water Supply, Rs : 385 (Negotiable) 38.5 Million
